original_title: 2004 Sound Horizon Chronicle 2nd Remake of the 1st CD Story
overview: 1st Story Renewal CD "Chronicle 2nd" (March 19, 2004)  1. Kuro no Yogensho / Black Prophecy  2. Shijin Ballad no Higeki / The tragedy of the poet Ballad (cap.7, p. 168)  3. Tadoritsuku Uta / Reaching Poems (cap.9, p. 883)  4. Arbelge no Tatakai (cap.8, p. 324)  5. Yakusoku no Oka / Promised Hill (cap.8, p. 216)  6. Bara no Kishidan / Knights of the Rose (cap.9, p. 468)
title: 2004 Sound Horizon Chronicle 2nd Remake of the 1st CD Story
